name: Views - Delete Existing Views
description: This feature is to verify the delete view and to validate if the existing view is deleted successfully and validate the same in the data base

elements.name: Verify whether I get a successful response returned for the PUT view API call and the data is successfully submitted to DB

steps.name: that I am submitting a DELETE view API request by passing viewID 147
I receive a response with status as successful for the DELETE view API request
I am not able to find the data of the viewId 147 in the DB

name: Views - Update Existing Views
description: This feature is to verify the Put - View and to validate if the existing view is updated sucessfully and validate the same in the data base

elements.name: Verify whether I get a successful response returned for the PUT view API call and the data is successfully submitted to DB

steps.name: that I am submitting a PUT view API request by passing viewID 11 for the field layout with the value Test New DP to the 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual values
I receive a response with status as successful for the PUT view API request

I am able to find the data of the field layout in the DB successfully updated the view with viewID 11 with the new value Test New DP for the view with 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual values
reset the data for the future test with the 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual value

elements.name: Verify whether I get a successful response returned for the PUT view API call and the data is successfully submitted to DB

steps.name: that I am submitting a PUT view API request by passing viewID 11 for the field default with the value false to the 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual values
I receive a response with status as successful for the PUT view API request

I am able to find the data of the field default in the DB successfully updated the view with viewID 11 with the new value false for the view with 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual values
reset the data for the future test with the 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual value

elements.name: Verify whether PUT view API response matches successfully with the schema provided

steps.name: that I am submitting a PUT view API request by passing viewID 11 for the field layout with the value Test New DP to the 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual values
I receive a response with status as successful for the PUT view API request
I receive a PUT view api call By 11 viewId request response for the layout with value Test New DP which matches with the schema provided
reset the data for the future test with the 11*3627*SubmissionWorkbench*From API 3*false*Test New DP actual value
